name: Spell Slots (spooncats)
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

Theme: Roll of the Dice

No sound effects because I didn't have time :(

Instructions: 

  • Click on the arrow keys on the side of the slot machine to activate that row of symbols.
  • Once you activate at least one row, roll the slots and generate a random spell based on the result of the symbols in the row
  • Once all your mana is used up (indicated by the blue bar), you and your opponent will trade blows.
  • Get bonus damage for rolling symbols that match the jackpot symbol on the slot machine
  • Face the unending horde of Dice Cultists and gather new symbols to help you on your way to victory!

All art and programming by me (spooncats)
